title: Another World {in My Backyard}
description: Connor discovers that his simple backyard is not what it appears to be...and neither is his dog Poochi. Join Connor, Poochi and their friends (both two and four legged) as they follow a gnomish ambassador into a fantastic world that desperately needs their courage and their friendship. While written for middle-school children, Another World (in my backyard) provides a fun adventure for all who love fantasy, especially those who love dogs and the very special role they play.
author: Jo Halstead
